title: Companion Approval Guide
content: camp, when the Owlbear cub comes with a dead bird as a gift, eat it. At Grymforge, replying "I'll do what I can" to the two gnomes - Lunkbug and Apprentice Laridda - digging to free True Soul Nere and wanting to free their friends. (Upon speaking with Shadowheart after dream sequence) Say "We should stop using the parasites ..." when confronted by the camp. When speaking with Eight (child on the far eastern side of the goblin camp), Say "Sorry for your loss" after asking about a corpse. Buy Oska
